Class ConstraintChecker

extends java.lang.Object
    A class for checking how playable a level is.

        public static double calculateDropFitness(DesignBoard board)

      • boardExtentFitness

        public static double boardExtentFitness(CandyBoard bBoard)
        This method calculates will the fitness between 0 and 1 for how large the overall board is. This fitness metric is based on the maximum width and height of the empty sections of the board
        Parameters:
        bBoard - The design of the level
        Returns:
        The gameplay fitness, 0 <= d <= 1

      • calculateFitness

        public static double calculateFitness(DesignBoard board)
        This method calculates will the constraints fitnesss between 0 and 1. This fitness metric is based on the layout of the design.
        Parameters:
        board - The design of the level
        Returns:
        The constraint fitness, 0 <= d <= 1
